(row = 6, col = 13)

Given that the current position of the avatar has not changed from the last time, it's essential to analyze the surroundings further and make a different action to avoid stagnation. 

The current position of the avatar is at (row = 6, col = 13), where it can see nearby elements as follows:
- To the left (row = 6, col = 12): empty space (.)
- To the right (row = 6, col = 14): empty space (.)
- Above (row = 5, col = 13): empty space (.)
- Below (row = 7, col = 13): empty space (.)
- There are also chefs in proximity below at (row = 6, col = 9) and (row = 6, col = 10) as well as others around.

Since the avatar's position hasn't changed, and there are no immediate items to collect in the next move, I will choose to move right (col = 14) to begin navigating away from nearby chefs and potentially find a free path while following the established strategy.

``` Action:2 ``` 

This action aims to reposition the avatar to explore a new area and move closer to any items while avoiding the chef.
